title: Vanguard Dipping a Toe into PE
itunes:title: Vanguard Dipping a Toe into PE
description:
Bloomberg News Tech Reporter Dana Hull discusses the virtuous circle that has enabled Tesla to raise about $14 billion over the last decade. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Sridhar Natarajan talks about a Goldman partner who is ditching the pursuit of quants for a marijuana startup. Bloomberg News P&I Reporter Devin Leonard provides his insight on the fascination and torture of Stave Puzzles. Bloomberg News Investing Reporter Annie Massa walks through Vanguard dipping a toe into PE. And we Drive to the Close with Rob Croce, Senior Portfolio Manager at Mellon.

Hosts: Jason Kelly and Taylor Riggs. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
